p: The published MERS-CoV homodimers PDB ID 6KL5 and 6KL6 were rebuilt for the initial analysis. Missing residues were added using 4UD1 as template. The isolated system was named IF-MERS-CoV whereas ligand-bonded dimers were called P1/ IF-MERS-CoV and P3/ IF-MERS-CoV (ligands were named as in the Houâ€™s article (Lin et al., 2020)).
